attributes.action: Protect the homeless after lockdown,  providing accommodation and full support.
attributes.additional_details: Act in a humane way and make the changes required to support and try to eradicate homelessness
attributes.background: To act now, we can not put people back onto the streets. Everyday the homeless put there lives at risk, more lives have been lost with pure negligence than any Pandemic. Each person must be supported as an individual with their own needs, with a team in place of professionals to care and guide.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/311860
